card.name: Black Lucifer, Sorcerer of Darkness

Put all creatures that have power 12000 or more from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. ■ When this creature would be discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead. ========================= ■ Destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less. ■ Choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into their graveyard.

card.name: Ballom, Lord of Demons/Ballom Cannon
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. ========================= ■ Each player puts all non-darkness cards from their mana zone into their graveyard.

card.name: Hurricane Crawler/Brain Charger
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all the cards from your hand into your mana zone. Then put that many cards from your mana zone into your hand. ========================= ■ Draw a card. ■ Charger

card.name: Codeking Number Nine/Ode to Joy
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Your opponent can't cast spells. ========================= ■ Look at the top 9 cards of your deck. You may take a card that costs 9 from your deck, show that card to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.

card.name: Bolshack Cross NEX/Bolshack Saga
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Power Attacker ■ Triple Breaker ■ Players can't summon creatures that cost 4 or less. ========================= ■ Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. From among them, you may put any number of Dragons that have Bolshack in their name into the battle zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.text: ■ Tap Ability ========================= ■ Your opponent discards all cards from their hand.

card.name: Magnum Lupia/Crimson Charger

Then you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Kirino Giant/Break Break Hit Tsubeshi Now

card.name: Ra Suneyoma Panzer/Aurora of Reversal

card.name: Dreaming Moon Knife/Sanctuary of the Mother
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may put a card from your hand into your mana zone. ========================= ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Codename Thirteen/Pandora Impact
